tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Name.description: The name of the policy. If omitted, Terraform will assign a random, unique name.

NamePrefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified prefix. Conflicts with `name`.

Path.description:
Path in which to create the policy.
See [IAM Identifiers](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/Using_Identifiers.html) for more information.

Policy.description: The policy document. This is a JSON formatted string. For more information about building AWS IAM policy documents with Terraform, see the [AWS IAM Policy Document Guide](https://learn.hashicorp.com/terraform/aws/iam-policy).
